inputs.name: debug_file
inputs.description: Path to an optional local to be written with 'startup_script'.

inputs.name: deployment_name
inputs.description: Name of the HPC deployment, used to name GCS bucket for startup scripts.

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Labels for the created GCS bucket. List key, value pairs.

inputs.name: runners
inputs.description:
List of runners to run on remote VM.
    Runners can be of type ansible-local, shell or data.
    A runner must specify one of 'source' or 'content'.
    All runners must specify 'destination'. If 'destination' does not include a
    path, it will be copied in a temporary folder and deleted after running.
    Runners may also pass 'args', which will be passed as argument to shell runners only.

outputs.name: startup_script
outputs.description: script to load and run all runners, as a string value.
